channel.title: NPR Topics: Culture
channel.description: Art and entertainment commentary plus interviews, book reviews, movie reviews, music reviews, comedy, and visual art. Subscribe to podcasts and follow trends in music, painting, art, architecture, photography, and design.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: A top chef weighs in on recipe ideas for the Kwanzaa table
item.description: The weeklong celebration of Kwanzaa is a perfect opportunity to revisit soothing, hearty winter foods, says celebrity chef Tanya Holland.
item.content:encoded: The weeklong celebration of Kwanzaa is a perfect opportunity to revisit soothing, hearty winter foods, says celebrity chef Tanya Holland.
item.dc:creator: Anastasia Tsioulcas

item.title: A college student in her 60s shares wisdom when it comes to reinventing oneself
item.description: Joan Steidl, who is now retired, shares her reinvention takeaways. She has a podcast about confronting the generational divide, takes comedy workshops and went back to college.
item.content:encoded: Joan Steidl, who is now retired, shares her reinvention takeaways. She has a podcast about confronting the generational divide, takes comedy workshops and went back to college.

item.title: 'Raising questions' isn't enough. The best films of the year took a stance
item.description: Now is not the time for subtlety, nostalgia or neutrality on screen.
item.content:encoded: Now is not the time for subtlety, nostalgia or neutrality on screen.
item.dc:creator: Aisha Harris

item.title: Genre fiction and female authors top U.S. libraries' most-borrowed lists in 2025
item.description: All of the top 10 books borrowed through the public library app Libby were written by women. And Kristin Hannah's The Women was the top checkout in many library systems around the country.
item.content:encoded:
All of the top 10 books borrowed through the public library app Libby were written by women. And Kristin Hannah's The Women was the top checkout in many library systems around the country.

(Image credit: Joe Raedle)
item.dc:creator: Neda Ulaby

item.title: Comic Cristela Alonzo grew up in fear of border patrol. ICE has 'brought it all back'
item.description: For the first seven years of her life, Alonzo lived in an abandoned diner in a south Texas border town. Her new Netflix stand-up special is called Upper Classy. Originally broadcast Sept. 25, 2025.
item.content:encoded: For the first seven years of her life, Alonzo lived in an abandoned diner in a south Texas border town. Her new Netflix stand-up special is called Upper Classy. Originally broadcast Sept. 25, 2025.
item.dc:creator: Terry Gross

item.title: A top chef weighs in on recipe ideas for the Kwanzaa table
item.description: The weeklong celebration of Kwanzaa is a perfect opportunity to revisit soothing, hearty winter foods, says celebrity chef Tanya Holland.
item.content:encoded:
The weeklong celebration of Kwanzaa is a perfect opportunity to revisit soothing, hearty winter foods, says celebrity chef Tanya Holland.

(Image credit: Aubrey Pick)
item.dc:creator: Anastasia Tsioulcas

item.title: This painting is missing. Do you have it?
item.description: An important work from a rediscovered artist has been absent from public view since the 1970s. A New York curator is hunting for it.
item.content:encoded: An important work from a rediscovered artist has been absent from public view since the 1970s. A New York curator is hunting for it.
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Vanasco

item.title: Sunday Puzzle: P-A-R-T-Y words and names
item.description: NPR's Ayesha Rascoe plays the puzzle with Mark Karp of Marlboro Township, N.J., and Weekend Edition Puzzlemaster Will Shortz.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Ayesha Rascoe plays the puzzle with Mark Karp of Marlboro Township, N.J., and Weekend Edition Puzzlemaster Will Shortz.
item.dc:creator: Will Shortz

item.title: Brigitte Bardot, sex goddess of cinema, has died
item.description: Legendary screen siren and animal rights activist Brigitte Bardot has died at age 91. The alluring former model starred in numerous movies, often playing the highly sexualized love interest.
item.content:encoded:
Legendary screen siren and animal rights activist Brigitte Bardot has died at age 91. The alluring former model starred in numerous movies, often playing the highly sexualized love interest.

(Image credit: Keystone Features)
item.dc:creator: Elizabeth Blair

item.title: 'It's behind you!' How Britain goes wild for pantomimes during the holidays
item.description: Pantomimes are plays based on a well-known story — often a fairy tale — which are given a bawdy twist. The audience is expected to join in throughout, shouting as loudly as they can.
item.content:encoded:
Pantomimes are plays based on a well-known story — often a fairy tale — which are given a bawdy twist. The audience is expected to join in throughout, shouting as loudly as they can.

(Image credit: Ella Carmen Dale)
item.dc:creator: Robbie Griffiths
